ValidationRule.description: POP must be attached for a Claim originating from Contractor or Homeowner.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(Origin) = 'Owner', TEXT(Origin) = 'Contractor' ), OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), TEXT( Claim_Stage__c ) = 'Submitted', ISBLANK( POPReceivedDate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure P.O.P is attached before submitting a Claim.
